summary: Implements a deprecated Cycle Diffusion pipeline that takes an input image and a text prompt, encodes them into latent space, iteratively denoises the latents with a conditional UNet and scheduler, decodes the final latents back to an image, and optionally runs a safety checker. The pipeline also includes utilities for loading and saving LoRA weights and textual inversion embeddings.
business_intent: Enable AI-driven image-to-image transformation guided by textual descriptions, supporting fineâ€‘tuning via LoRA and textual inversion for customized artistic generation.
